## CssDisplay type

Represents css display values

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type CssDisplay = 'block' | 'inline' | 'inline-block' | 'flex' | 'inline-flex' | 'table' | 'none' | 'table-row' | 'table-column' | 'table-cell' | 'inline-table' | 'list-item' | 'run-in' | 'table-caption' | 'table-column-group' | 'table-header-group' | 'table-footer-group' | 'table-row-group' | 'initial' | 'inherit';
```
